titleStmt.title: The remonstrance of the nobility, barrones, burgesses, ministers and commons within the kingdome of Scotland Vindicating them and their proceedings from the crymes, wherewith they are charged by the late proclamation in England, Feb. 27. 1639.
titleStmt.author: Church of Scotland. General Assembly.
Henderson, Alexander, 1583?-1646. aut

notesStmt.note: At end: Revised according to the ordinance of the generall Assembly .. 22. of March 1639.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
